text: Nɨ nan gumazamiziba Israelian apanim damusɨ izam, mati amozir ekiamɨn ghuariar pɨzim me avara. Dughiar abuananam otoghtɨ, kɨ nɨ isɨ uan nguazim mɨsoghsɨ nɨ amadagham. O Gok, kɨ kamaghsua, nɨ damighamin arazir kamɨn, kɨ uabɨ isɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar akagham, eghtɨ me na gɨfogh suam, kɨ Godɨn bar zuezim.
